0110011000101000 0011100010101111 0 -> sum: 1001111011010111, cout: 0

1000111010000100 0101100011000100 1 -> sum: 1110011101001001, cout: 0
1001111011101111 0110010001000111 0 -> sum: 0000001100110110, cout: 1
